comment: Dr. Simmons is unfair in her grading and unwilling to give out A's. She will not help you on developing your essays and her test questions are irrational and irrelevant. Overall, she is very well educated but is cruel to her students and not particularly nice.

Dr. Simmons is an amazing professor. When we had discussions about our reading assignments, she always made the most interesting, thought-provoking comments. Make sure you read, Read, READ because you WILL have a quiz over assigned reading. Be sure to take good notes because the answer choices can be tricky.

Dr. Simmons is not as bad as people say! She is a sweet lady and cares for her students. The problem is that sometimes her exams aren't very clear! Whenever we have a test, even if I read all of the material, I still feel like I don't know the answers for half of the test. To pass, make sure you take notes on the books you read and come to class!

I don't know why Dr. Simmons has received such poor reviews... I read these and was scared to take her class, but I found that she was actually one of my favorite professors. Very sweet and nice, she laughs a lot, and is always willing to make each student strive to do their best. One of the best professors out there hands down.

It would behoove you to avoid taking this class at all costs. Dr. Simmons is extremely rude and harsh. If you have any questions concerning your performance in her class she will dismiss you instead of trying to rationally help you.

She was very unhelpful and unclear. You are not allowed ANY excused absences. Class is boring. The books we read were boring. Tests are very hard and ask absurd questions that were never discussed in class.
Mrs Simmons is a very nice lady and seems to know her craft. Her class is very easy, and she is very helpful.
DO NOT TAKE HER!!! SHE IS A TERRIBLE PROFESSOR!

Dr. Simmons is one of the most personable professors I've met. She is not necessarily and easy graded but guides every student to become a better writer and it is absolutely possible to succeed in her class.

Not clear about assignments. I would either get an A or C on papers. Classes are very boring and she thinks she is funny when she is not. I got a C because of one stupid assignment that was short, but was either pass or fail. Avoid!
Dr. Simmons is a very smart lady. She wants students to think and improve. Her class is somewhat difficult, yet I liked it a lot. Has a very sweet heart.

DO NOT TAKE HER! She is a smart lady. However, she does not know how to teach in a way that will help you improve your writing. Unclear on directions until after she returns your paper with a "C" on it, then she explains.

Dr. Simmons is a nice lady who is very well educated. I am usually an A student, but I may end up with a B in this class. She doesn't like to tell you exactly what she wants in an assignment until after you have turned that assignment in. You just have to hope that what you did is good enough. Overall difficult class, avoid her if possible.

She is a really nice professor but is very opinionated and thinks everything she says is hilarious,its not. Her class wasn't too tough but she isn't clear on assignments which became frustrating. Class got cancelled A LOT. In her class we just sat there and talk and sometimes take notes. its an easy class she can just get a bit annoying.

I took Dr. Simmons for ENGL 1102. She was nice. I felt that she wasn't very clear on assignments. She really only likes one certain style of writing and grades papers based on her opinion on what you're saying, which bothered me. However, I easily got an A without reading the text and adjusting my writing style according to what she said she liked.
